# Tiltr: Alternative Twitter App

Tiltr is an alternative to Twitterâ€™s normal UI; the focus is on art discovery and exploration. I loved using Elm and Node.js to build this, and am happy to have set up a CI/CD pipeline through GitHub and Heroku!

Live link: [tiltr.cc](https://href.li/?https://tiltr.cc)
